name: Karisma-01
overview: Fight against the flying intergalactic alien bases and watch out for their defense machines and defeat the Tarxon empire and save the inhabitants of the Earth save them from their extinction. You'll come up against "alien spore replicants", spaceships, robots, defense turrets and all kinds of obstacles ... You'll have to fly over the various tunnels and reach the main node where you'll find the alien Big Boss. Beat him...! The project was implemented in "Seuck Sideway L v3.0 Sensible Software 2008" by Pinov Vox, ingame music by Richard Bayliss and Vg Vox, title music by Vg Vox (2020). - Port 2 or 1 Joystick to guide your space ship.
